headline: Caroline Wright,  Diego Garcia-Olano
abstract: The couple met briefly in 2006 while playing in separate bands but sharing a drummer, Aaron Castillo. Their paths parted until 2016, when they met again at Mr. Castilloâ€™s wedding.
lead_paragraph: Caroline Murphy Wright and Diego Garcia-Olano were married Jan. 11 at Terlingua Church in Terlingua Ghost Town, Texas. Stephen Harrigan, a Universal Life minister, performed the ceremony with Quaker elements.
